title: Add Two Numbers (Linked List)
description: You are given two non-empty linked lists representing two non-negative integers. The digits are stored in reverse order. Add the numbers and return the sum as a linked list.
hints: Use dummy node and track carry.

title: Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters
description: Return the length of the longest substring without repeating characters. Use sliding window and a map to track last seen index.
hints: Move left pointer to maintain no duplicates inside window.

title: Search in Rotated Sorted Array
description: Find target in a rotated sorted array using binary search in O(log n).

title: Container With Most Water
description: Given heights, return max water that can be trapped between two lines using two pointers.

title: Kth Largest Element in an Array
description: Return the kth largest element using a min-heap or sorting.
hints: Sorting is simplest; heap optimal for streaming.

title: Top K Frequent Elements
description: Return k most frequent elements using frequency map + bucket sort.

title: Product of Array Except Self
description: Return array where each element = product of all others without using division.

title: Number of Islands
description: Count islands in grid of '1' and '0'. Use DFS/BFS to mark visited land.

title: Coin Change
description: Return minimum coins to make the given amount using DP.

title: Word Break
description: Determine if a string can be segmented into words from dictionary using DP.
hints: dp[i] = true if any j<i such that dp[j] and substring matches dictionary.
